name: Space Pack
overview: In the year 2051, deep space ships keep getting destroyed by alien creatures that can't be killed with conventional means. A brave group of volunteers is sent out in space suits and an assortment of experimental new weapons from the "space pack" project. It is up to you to find out which one of the seven weapons works the best against each of ten aliens. Fights play out differently depending on which alien you fight and which weapon you use.
